title: Adobe Photoshop Elements 2025 & Premiere Elements 2025 Student & Teacher Edition | PC/Mac Code | Software Download | Photo & Video Editing | 3-year term license | Activation Required
description: With the magic of AI and automation behind the scenes, it’s never been easier to create amazingphotos and shareworthy videos.• Discover new ways to combine pics and remove objects, create depth, and change colorsin your photos, or style title text and transform colors in your videos.• Grow your skills with dozens of step-by-step Guided Edits.• Make any photo your creative canvas with new modern textures and graphics, andenhance your video storytelling with eye-catching effects and transitions.• Share favorite moments in Photo Reels, Highlight Reels, collages, slideshows, and more.• Effortlessly organize it all. And be creative on the go with the web and mobile companionapps (beta).Note: The Elements web and mobile beta apps are available in English, French, German, andJapanese.
